title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 511 - Medical Care-utilization review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 511 - Medical Care-utilization review

§ 511.1 - Utilization review

§ 511.3 - Excluded services
§ 511.4 - Benefit year; service units (Repealed)
§ 511.5 - Applications for utilization threshold increases and exemptions (Repealed)
§ 511.6 - Review of applications (Repealed)
§ 511.7 - Additional service units pending determination of applications (Repealed)
§ 511.8 - Determinations (Repealed)
§ 511.9 - Fair hearings (Repealed)
§ 511.10 - Physician and clinic services - utilization threshold (Repealed)
§ 511.11 - Pharmacy services - utilization threshold (Repealed)
§ 511.12 - Laboratory services - utilization threshold (Repealed)
§ 511.13 - Mental health clinic programs-utilization threshold (Repealed)
§ 511.14 - Dental clinic services-utilization threshold (Repealed)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 3, pt. 511

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 34[3][f], 363- a[2], 365-g

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
